posts.description: 4Chan Poster Gloriously Interrupts Clinton Alt-Right Speech | We Are Change
posts.extended: As Democratic candidate Hillary Clinton gave a speech in Reno attempting to smear the millions of people who support her opponent Donald Trump as racist monsters — 4chan was in the building to gloriously troll the low-energy event.

posts.description: How We Rebuilt the Wall Street Journal’s Graphics Team - Features - Source: An OpenNews project
posts.extended: The Wall Street Journal recently took steps to merge our print graphics department with our interactive team. Our new team is simply named Graphics. Many other organizations are undergoing similar changes.

posts.description: Playing WWII Sim ‘Hearts of Iron IV’ Makes the Modern World Look Like It’s On the Brink | VICE | United Kingdom
posts.extended: A spectre is haunting Europe – the spectre of fascism. Or maybe it's the spectre of terrorism, nativism, Russian irredentism, or any number of other unpleasant isms.

posts.description: How Chance the Rapper's Life Became Perfect | GQ
posts.extended: At just 23, Chance The Rapper has already earned the love and respect of his elders, like Kanye West, who let him lead off on The Life of Pablo, and his musical peers, who hear a generational voice in his third mixtape, Coloring Book.

posts.description: 'I’m not paranoid': These Americans are doing more that just stockpiling food and ammunition. | The Washington Post
posts.extended: Don and Jonna Bradway recently cashed out of the stock market and invested in gold and silver.
I love Apple Notes, and it’s now a central part of my life.

posts.description: The Narcissism of One-Sided Romantic Obsession | Broadly
posts.extended: "I could tell you in the vaguest of terms that I have an academic book project that I'm working on that was sparked by an offhand remark made on Twitter by a woman I nearly slept with on June 28, 2013, who then refused to ever speak with me again and I'll never know why.

posts.description: John Tang of FRONTEER on How to Make a Sneaker | HYPEBEAST
posts.extended: If you’ve already conquered the task of screen printing t-shirts, what’s the next step? Designing sneakers of course. To aid in this challenge John Tang, creative director of FRONTEER, explains the intricacies involved when designing and making a sneaker from scratch.

posts.description: BuzzFeed splits news, entertainment units in reorganization - Aug. 23, 2016
posts.extended: Staking its future on video, BuzzFeed has announced that it will split into two units: a new, video-focused BuzzFeed Entertainment Group and BuzzFeed News.

posts.description: Meet Monero, the Currency Dark Net Dealers Hope Is More Anonymous Than Bitcoin | Motherboard
posts.extended: Not even bitcoin is anonymous enough for some criminals on the dark net. For years, the cryptocurrency has been the payment method of choice for people buying and selling drugs and other illegal items on the dark net.
